amendatorysection.catchline: Rules; power of Board of Educational Lands and Funds.
amendatorysection.para: Rules may be adopted by the Board of Educational Lands and Funds found necessary for carrying out the purposes and provisions of sections 72-301 to 72-314, and such rules, where not in conflict with said sections, shall have the same force and effect.

source.para: Laws 1918, Thirty-sixth Spec. Sess., c. 7, § 15, p. 48;
